pageProduct.name: Xtend BCAA Watermelon Explosion 30 Serves
pageProduct.description:
General Information

7G BCAAs 2:1:1 Ratio Designed By Nature, Proven by Research: Scivation XTEND is the best-selling, most-advanced BCAA drink mix on the planet. At the heart of XTEND is 7g of BCAAs in the nature-designed and research-proven 2:1:1 ratio, plus glutamine and citrulline malate. Plus, with a proprietary blend of hydration-inducing electrolytes, XTEND is a sugar-free way to help anyone grind through a grueling gym session. World-class athletes, champion fighters, elite bodybuilders, and weight training enthusiasts of varying types all use Scivation XTEND during their workouts in order to train longer, harder, and with more intensity.

Scivation Xtend is perfect before, during and after training: Designed for intra-workout consumption and shown effective in two university studies*, Scivation XTEND is still the most advanced product of its kind. Scivation XTEND helps to facilitate both fat loss and new muscle construction. Also, by orchestrating optimal protein synthesis and by balancing the intracellular energy economy, Scivation XTEND severely truncates recovery time. You just don't feel recovered, you are recovered.

After more than ten years, Scivation are still at the top of the game With show-stopping mixability, enhanced flavor systems, and an array of ingredients in physiologically-relevant amounts, Scivation XTEND continues to outpace comparison. And as always Scivation XTEND is sugar-free and carbohydrate-free. Use Scivation XTEND, the original and most widely-used intra-workout product, to build muscle, burn fat, and to prolong the intensity of and recovery from your next workout

Warnings

This product is only intended for healthy adults, 18 years of age or older. Do not use if pregnant or nursing. Consult with a licensed, qualified, healthcare professional before taking this or any dietary supplement product, especially if you are taking medication or have a medical condition. Discontinue 2 weeks prior to surgery. Use only as directed. Do not use if safety seal is broken or missing. Store in a cool, dry place. KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN.

Common Uses

BUILD MUSCLE. 
BURN FAT. 
RECOVER FASTER.
REPLENISHES ELECTROLYTES

Ingredients

L-Leucine,  L-Glutamine, L-Isoleucine, L-Valine, Citric Acid, Citrulline Malate 1:1, Sodium Citrate, Malic Acid, Potassium Chloride, Sodium Chloride, Natural & Artificial Flavors, Citric Acid, Malic Acid, Sucralose, Acesulfame Potassium (Ace-K), Pyridoxine HCl (Vitamin B6).

 

Directions

As a dietary supplement, mix each level scoop in 10-14 fl. oz. of water (adjust for taste preference) and shake well. On training days, consume 1 level scoop during exercise and 1 level scoop after exercise. On non-training days, consume 2 level scoops throughout the day. For best results, consume daily.
